import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getDetails } from '../actions/index'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { resetDetail } from '../actions/index' import loading from '../media/loading.jpg' import backgroundDetail from '../media/backgroundDetail.mp4' import videoback from '../media/videoback.mp4' import styles from '../Styles/Detail.module.css' export default function Detail(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getDetails(props.match.params.id)); return function cleanup() { dispatch(resetDetail()) } }, [dispatch]); const myVideogame = useSelector((state) => state.detail) return (

GameHub

{ myVideogame.length > 0 ?

{myVideogame[0].name}

Genres:

{myVideogame[0].genres ? myVideogame[0].genres.map(g =>

{g}

) : 'No Genres Available'}

Platforms:

{myVideogame[0].platforms ? myVideogame[0].platforms.map(g =>

{g}

) : 'No Platforms Available'}

Rating:

{myVideogame[0].rating}

Release Date:

{myVideogame[0].released}

{myVideogame[0].description?.replace(/<[^>]*>?/g, '')}

: }
) }
